title: Storing Mini Bell Peppers

items.name: Crisper drawer in a breathable bag
items.details: Store in the crisper drawer of the refrigerator in a breathable bag such as a perforated plastic bag or produce bag. This maintains freshness while allowing airflow.

items.name: Avoid airtight containers
items.details: Unlike cut peppers, whole mini bell peppers should not be sealed in airtight containers as excess moisture causes faster spoilage.

items.name: Shelf life
items.details: Properly stored, mini bell peppers last about 1-2 weeks in the fridge.

notes: The key difference from storing cut bell peppers is that whole mini peppers need airflow rather than a sealed environment. Breathable bags are the way to go.
